title: 81/936/EEC: Commission Decision of 10 November 1981 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in the Netherlands pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC (Only the Dutch text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 10 November 1981 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in the Netherlands pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC (Only the Dutch text is authentic) (81/936/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Having regard to the Order of 29 March 1979 concerning the reconstruction of areas formerly used for horticulture under glass and the Order of 26 June 1981 amending the Order concerning the reconstruction of areas formerly used for horticulture under glass, forwarded on 24 July 1981, the existing provisions for the implementation of Directive 72/159/EEC in the Netherlands continue to satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to common measures within the meaning of Article 15 of Directive 72/159/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 November 1981.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 1.  (2) OJ No L 197, 20.7.1981, p. 41.
